name: Lands of Stories
description:
Lands of Stories is a early-assets action-adventure game, where you will travel, explore and fight in an open world full of risks.

Exploration, fighting, tale, open world is a key features of our game. The fantasy world of the game will be divided on flying isles, and have a lot of activities, and reasons to travel and explore. The game tale will about unification against a general enemy. Various fighting system, where you can make covert and overt attacks; fight sword, that attacks will based on combination of other attacks, or physically based bow.
